mapper.select: select book.book_no, book.title, book.img_path, book.running_time, author.name from book, author where book.author_no = author.author_no and book.title LIKE concat( '%', #{keyword},'%') or author.name LIKE concat('%', #{keyword} ,'%');
select book.book_no, book.title, book.img_path, book.running_time, author.name from book, author where book.author_no = author.author_no order by reg_date desc;

SELECT book.title, book.book_no, book.img_path, book.running_time, author.name ,count(library.user_no) as cnt FROM book JOIN library ON library.book_no=book.book_no JOIN author ON author.author_no=book.author_no WHERE book.category=#{category} GROUP BY book_no ORDER BY cnt DESC LIMIT 6

SELECT book.title, book.book_no, book.img_path, book.running_time, author.name FROM book JOIN author ON author.author_no=book.author_no WHERE book.category=#{category} ORDER BY book.reg_date DESC LIMIT 6

SELECT book.title, book.book_no, book.img_path, book.running_time, author.name FROM book JOIN author ON author.author_no=book.author_no WHERE book.category=#{category} and Audio_check=0 ORDER BY title LIMIT 6

SELECT book.title, book.book_no, book.img_path, book.running_Time, author.name ,count(library.user_no) as cnt FROM book JOIN library ON library.book_no=book.book_no JOIN author ON author.author_no=book.author_no GROUP BY book_no ORDER BY cnt DESC LIMIT 6

SELECT book.title, book.book_no, book.img_path, book.running_Time, author.name ,count(library.user_no) as cnt FROM book JOIN library ON library.book_no=book.book_no JOIN author ON author.author_no=book.author_no WHERE library.reg_date BETWEEN DATE_ADD(now(), INTERVAL-1 MONTH) AND now() GROUP BY book_no ORDER BY cnt DESC LIMIT 6;

SELECT book.title, book.book_no, book.img_path, book.running_Time, author.name ,count(library.user_no) as cnt FROM book JOIN library ON library.book_no=book.book_no JOIN author ON author.author_no=book.author_no WHERE book.reg_date BETWEEN DATE_ADD(now(), INTERVAL-1 MONTH) AND now() GROUP BY book_no ORDER BY cnt DESC LIMIT 6;
select * from book, author where book.author_no = author.author_no and book.book_no=#{no};

select library.user_no, book.title, library.book_no, book.img_path, book.running_time, author.name from book,author,library,user where book.author_no=author.author_no and user.user_no=library.user_no and book.book_no=library.book_no and book.book_no not in (select book_no from library where email=#{email}) order by library.user_no, library.reg_date;
select * from book, author where book.author_no = author.author_no and book.title=#{title} and book.category=#{category} and author.name=#{authorName};
